## src_databases

## Description
Show database list


## Usage
```r
src_databases(sc, col = "databaseName", ...)
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | A `spark_connection`. |
| col | The column name of the table that lists all databases may be referred to as `namespace` in some versions of the system. |
| ... | Optional arguments; currently unused. |
